catalogue_raissonne:
New Holllstein (Dutch & Flemish) 112 (Hendrik Hondius I)
van Sommeren 1888 5275
description: portrait of Bartholomeus Spranger; half length turned right looking back at viewer; wearing doublet, ruff and fur lined mantle; holding roll of paper in left hand; arms crossed
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

 in image upper right corner: Hh exc. | below image in black: BARTHOLOMAEUS SPRANGERUS, PICT. / ANVERPIANUS / four lines in Latin: Hic ille est ... Caesearibusque fimut  | on sheet in pencil: 2-425
portfolio: From Pictorum Aliquot Celebrium Praecipuae Germaniae Inferioris Effigies
title: Bartholomaeus Sprangerus, Pict. Anverpianus
